title: Delete a favorite
name: DeleteFavorite
description: Logged in users delete their favorited trail

Error 4xx.description: The user is not authorized to access this route.

title: View favorited trail
name: GETFavorite
description: Users can view created favorite when using its ID

Error 4xx.description: The user is not authorized to access this route.

title: View all favorited trails
name: GETFavorites
description: Logged in users can view all their favorited trails

Error 4xx.description: The user is not authorized to access this route.

title: Create a favorite trail
name: PostFavorite
description: Signed up users can create favorite trails and rank them

title: Update a favorited trail
name: UpdateFavorite
description: Logged in users update their favorited trails

Error 4xx.description: The user is not authorized to access this route.

title: delete a rating for a trail
name: DeleteRating
description: Users can delete a rating for a trail.

title: Create a rating for a trail
name: PostRating
description: Users can create a rating for a trail.

title: Update a rating for a trail
name: UpdateRating
description: Users can update a rating for a trail.

title: View a rating
name: ViewRating
description: Users can view a rating for a trail.

title: View all ratings
name: ViewRatings
description: Users can view all ratings for all trail.

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
[
  {
    "id": 1,
    "user_id": 1,
    "trail_id": 1,
    "rating": 4,
    "review":"very good",
    "created_at": '2016-06-29 14:26:16 UTC',
    "updated_at": '2016-06-29 14:26:16 UTC'
  },
 {
    "id": 2,
    "user_id": 1,
    "trail_id": 2,
    "rating": 5,
    "review":"super good",
    "created_at": '2016-06-29 14:26:16 UTC',
    "updated_at": '2016-06-29 14:26:16 UTC'
  }

]
